title: SPC-6500-1

@@ @@

[[div class="table]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:image-block
|name=https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/fragment%3Aspc-6500-1/spc6500-1.png
|caption=Projections of Future Selachian Population in 10 years
|width=700px
|align=center
]]
[[/div]]
------
[[=]]
+++++ ##0047C2|**SELACHIAN PUGNATORIAL CAPABILITIES**## 
[[/=]]
------
SPC-6500 is a long-term plan to ensure that there will always be Selachian entities to punch. 

This is crucial to enabling the Centre's mission into perpetuity.

@@ @@ 
------
[[=]]
+++++ ##0047C2|**SPECIFIC PROJECT COMPONENTS**##
[[/=]]
------
The Molina-Solstice-Anastasakos Selachian Population Model suggests that at the current rate of pugilism, all species within the superorder //Selachimorpha// will be extinct within a decade. 

The Molina-Solstice-Anastasakos model has been modified to simulate using the Selachian replication properties of [[[SPC-2000]]] at double, triple, quintuple, vigintuple, quinquagintuple, and centuple times capacity.  At no point has the model indicated that current pugilism levels will be sustainable beyond a decade.

Following the termination of all non-Deviant Selachian Entities, the Swann-Pickman model of Deviant phenomena predicts that Selachian Deviant phenomena will cease manifesting.

Without Selachian Entities, the Centre will not have targets to pugilate.

The Centre's core mission will no longer be possible.

We are at an Impasse.

[[=]]
+ ##0047C2|//Choose Your Path//##
[[/=]]
[[div class="cards"]]
[[f=image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/fragment%3Aspc-6500-1/handshake.png
 link="http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/spc-6500/offset/2" width="180px"]]
[[f=image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/fragment%3Aspc-6500-1/swamp.png
 link="http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/spc-6500/offset/3" width="180px"]]
[[f=image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/fragment%3Aspc-6500-1/hunter.png
 link="http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/spc-6500/offset/4" width="180px"]]
[[f=image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/fragment%3Aspc-6500-1/fist.png
 link="http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/spc-6500/offset/5" width="180px"]]
[[/div]]
[[tabview]]
[[tab DIPLOMAT]]
= Extend an open hand to the Sharkic Empires. End millennia of strife. Work with the Sharkics to ensure that Selachian Entities will always remain available for pugilism. 
= Negotiate for a suitable number of pugilism targets.
[[/tab]]
[[tab CONSERVATIONIST]]
= Join forces with Wilson's Wildlife Foundation. Aid them in constructing Selachian Conservation Preserves, in which Selachian Entities will remain protected. 
= Harvest targets from this stable breeding population.
[[/tab]]
[[tab HUNTER]]
= Find the whereabouts of the immortal Mr. Percival Shark, formally of Marshall, Carter, and Shark Ltd. 
= Imprison him and use him as the Sole Pugilism Candidate until another solution to the Impasse can be found.
[[/tab]]
[[tab PUGILIST]]
= Embrace Violence. Continue as we have! No Selachian Entity shall go unpummeled! No fin shall go unbruised! For the Glory of the Centre!
= Search. Punch. Conquer.
[[/tab]]
[[/tabview]]
author: LORDXVNV
